name: Ninja Match 2.0
description:
Ninja Match Match 3 and fighting game

In this game you will have to make combinations of three or more equal pieces to fill the bars of your player and win the fight! (Except for the special tiles, no need to make combinations with them).

The more fights won, the more points you will get, but if you lose a fight, you lose all your accumulated points.

Each piece fills the bar with its respective color. There are pieces for life, for points and others to attack your opponent!

There are 7 different scenarios!
